TypeSignature.Value: public struct SqlDateTime : IComparable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlDateTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable, class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public Structure SqlDateTime Implements IComparable, INullable, IXmlSerializable
public value class SqlDateTime : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable, System::Xml::Serialization::IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 表示要存放在資料庫或從資料庫擷取的日期與時間資料，值範圍從 1753 年 1 月 1 日至 9999 年 12 月 31 日，精確度為 3.33 毫秒。

span.span: Represents the date and time data ranging in value from January 1, 1753 to December 31, 9999 to an accuracy of 3.33 milliseconds to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

summary.span: 結構擁有的基礎資料結構與其對應的 .NET Framework 型別 不同，後者可以表示介於 0001 年 1 月 1 日上午 12:00:00 到 9999 年 12 月 31 日下午 11:59:59 的任何時間，精確度可達 100 奈秒。

span.span: The structure has a different underlying data structure from its corresponding .NET Framework type, , which can represent any time between 12:00:00 AM 1/1/0001 and 11:59:59 PM 12/31/9999, to the accuracy of 100 nanoseconds.

summary.span: 實際儲存的則是與 1900 年 1 月 1 日上午 00:00:00 的相對差異。

span.span: actually stores the relative difference to 00:00:00 AM 1/1/1900.

summary.span: 因此將 "00:00:00 AM 1/1/1900" 轉換成整數的結果將傳回 0。

span.span: Therefore, a conversion from "00:00:00 AM 1/1/1900" to an integer will return 0.
